name: Showtime Disaster (Makushi)
description:
Fire? Panic? Emergencies? This concert has everything needed to be Out of control. Play as a security guard and finish the concert without the public going mad.

 Programming: Kevin Miles  |  Art: Silvy Cisternas |  Sounds & Music: Maximiliano Viñas Craba

A game for the 2020 Game Makers's Toolkit Jam!
